OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD UNIVERSITY LESBIAN, GAY, BISEXUAL AND TRANS COMMITTEE (LGBT)

Desc.entry: A voluntary organisation which runs weekly meetings for students and non-students who identify as lesbian, gay, bisexual, trans or who think they might be. Provides sexual, mental and physical health support. Also runs regular campaigns, socials and a lounge offering tea, coffee, information, a library and copies of the gay press.

Address.entry: University of Sheffield Union of Students

ProvisionPlace.entry: University of Sheffield Union of Students

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues 7.-8pm, from 8pm (social, please contact for details)
